channel.title: CVE Feed for jQuery Tagline Rotator -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for jQuery Tagline Rotator -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-34663|2024-08-04T00:19:47.819Z -- jquery%20tagline%20rotator -- jquery%20tagline%20rotator
item.description: The jQuery Tagline Rotator WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] in the ~/jquery-tagline-rotator.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 0.1.5.
